feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-07-23T12:00:29.205279Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;魔法王国的落魄</stitle>; <id>;https://www.gutenberg.org/files/8086/8086-h/8086-h.htm</id>; <updated>;202 3-07-23T11:00:05.476300Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.gutenberg.org/files/8086/8086-h/8086-h.htm"/>; <author>; <name>;keepamovin</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=keepamovin</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;陷入困境《魔法王国》是一个引人入胜的科幻故事，故事发生在华特·迪士尼统治世界、死亡被治愈的未来。主角努力保护魔法王国最初的人类面貌，对抗地球的后人类继承者。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#down-and-out-in-the-magic-kingdom" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36833951" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;通过这个博客，我找到了 IT 工作，我正在做什么</stitle>; <id>;https://giuliomagnifico.blog/misc/2023/07/22/I-found-a-IT-job-thanks-to-this-blog.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T07:00:05.575041Z</updated>; <link href="https://giulio magnifico.blog/misc/2023/07/22/I-found-a-IT-job-thanks-to-this-blog.html"/>; <author>; <name>;giuliomagnifico</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=giuliomagnifico</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://giuliomagnifico.blog/_images/20 23/IT-jobs-blog/IMG_9768.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：165px；" />;<br />;一家安全公司在阅读作者的博文后向作者提供了一份工作。作者接受了这份工作，现在担任 DevOps 或系统管理员，使用 Grafana 和 Prometheus 构建数据中心并创建监控系统。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#i-found-a-it-jobs-thanks-to-this-blog-what-im-doing" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36833089" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hack ernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;中世纪餐桌礼仪：最梅西的神话？</stitle>; <id>;https://www.medievalists.net/2023/06/medieval-table-manners/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T10:00:05.576560Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.medievalists.net/20 23/06/medieval-table-manners/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;BerislavLopac</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=BerislavLopac</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.medievalists.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/medieval-table-manners.jpg" style="width: 220px ；高度：126px；" />;<br />;中世纪人们的餐桌礼仪和期望与现代社会相似。他们饭前洗手、餐巾纸并重视一张布置良好的餐桌。他们应该有尊严地吃饭，不要含着食物说话，并避免凌乱的饮食习惯。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#medieval-table-manners-the-messiest-myth" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36811460" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;简单破坏现场手册 - 如何摧毁您的组织</stitle>; <id>;https://butwhatfor.beehiiv.com/p/simple-sabotage-field-manual-destroy-organizations</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T03:00:05.577346Z</updated>; <link href="https://butwhatfor.beehiiv.com/ p/simple-sabotage-field-manual-destroy-organizations"/>; <author>; <name>;stanrivers</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=stanrivers</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/publication /logo/6e13193f-5294-4834-b927-9e7eb6a11f23/thumb_BWF_Blue_Logo_800.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：221px；" />;<br />;《简单破坏现场手册》是二战期间战略情报局使用的指南，用于培训德国占领区的个人如何破坏他们的工作场所。它提供了煽动和执行简单破坏活动的建议，其中包括做出错误决定、采取不合作态度以及诱导其他人也这样做。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#simple-sabotage-field-manual-how-to-destroy-your-organizations" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36831946" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hacker news.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;德意志银行“功能失调”的 IT 部门（2018 年）</stitle>; <id>;https://www.efinancialcareers.co.uk/news/2018/04/technology-at-deutsche-bank</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T11:00:05.579543Z</updated>; <link href=" https://www.efinancialcareers.co.uk/news/2018/04/technology-at-deutsche-bank"/>; <author>; <name>;Cwizard</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Cwizard</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.filestackcontent.com/output=format:webp/resize=width:730,height:4 32、fit:crop/jbmbWG2TRzaaoQM66rur?cache=true" style="宽度：220px；高度：131px；" />;<br />;德意志银行首席运营官金·哈蒙兹(Kim Hammonds)在将银行描述为“极其复杂”且“功能失调”的工作场所后即将离开该银行。她的主要任务是简化银行的操作系统，但两年半后，德意志银行仍然拥有 32 个不同的操作系统。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#deutsche-bank-s-dysfunction-it-division-2018" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36833915" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;AOL 撤下 Nullsoft 文件共享软件 WASTE (2003)</stitle>; <id>;https://web.archive.org/web/20030810194502/http://news.com.com/2100-1032_3-1011585.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T00:00:0 5.580253Z</更新>; <link href="https://web.archive.org/web/20030810194502/http://news.com.com/2100-1032_3-1011585.html"/>; <作者>; <name>;ecliptik</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ecliptik</uri>; </author>; <content type="html ” 在美国在线 Nullsoft 部门的开发人员悄悄发布文件共享软件一天后，AOL 从该子公司的网站上撤下了该产品的链接。这款名为 Waste 的软件可以让团体建立私人、安全的文件共享网络。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#aol-pulls-nullsoft-file-sharing-software-waste-2003" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36830860" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews .betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;TokenFlow：一致的扩散功能，实现一致的视频编辑</stitle>; <id>;https://diffusion-tokenflow.github.io/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T23:00:05.580997Z</updated>; <link href="https://diffusion-tokenflow.github.io/"/>; <author>; <name>;puttycat</name>; <uri>;https:// news.ycombinator.com/user?id=puttycat</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://diffusion-tokenflow.github.io/pics/pipeline.png" style="width: 220px; height: 117px;" />;<br />;Text2video-zero 和 Tune-a-video 是文本到视频的扩散模型，可从文本生成视频。结构和内容引导的视频合成以及即插即用扩散功能也用于文本驱动的图像到图像的翻译。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#tokenflow-consist-diffusion-features-for-consistent-video-editing" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36830490" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews .betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;EasyGraph：图形分析和社交计算的综合工具</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/easy-graph/Easy-Graph</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T05:00:05.581720Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/easy-graph/Easy-Graph"/>; <author>; <name>;DinoPeppa </name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=DinoPeppa</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/44c87c1bbe99c74e1a30a254a11315005d59b0704dea28dd4283da07021e2d34/easy-graph/ Easy-Graph" style="宽度：220px；高度：110px；" />;<br />;EasyGraph是一个用Python编写的开源图形处理库。它支持无向图和有向图的分析，并实现各种图挖掘算法。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#easygraph-a-compressive-tool-for-graph-analysis-and-social-computing" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36832433" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernew s.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Vimspector – Vim 调试器统治一切</stitle>; <id>;https://puremourning.github.io/vimspector-web/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T23:00:05.582409Z</updated>; <link href="https://puremourning.github.io/vimspector-web/"/>; <author>; <name>;s ynergy20</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=synergy20</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://puremourning.github.io/vimspector-web/img/vimspector-overview.png" style="width: 220px; height: 138px;" />;<br />;本文提供了如何使用 Vimspector 在 Vim 中调试 C 程序的教程。它涵盖了 Vimspector 的安装和配置，以及代码窗口中可用的功能和操作。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#vimspector-the-vim-debugger-rules-all" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36830513" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io /feed.xml">; <title type="text">;如何在家制作奶酪</stitle>; <id>;https://www.themanual.com/food-and-drink/how-to-make-cheese/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T02:00:05.583084Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.themanual.com/food-and-drink/how-to-make-cheese/"/>; <author>; <name>;tosh</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=tosh</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.themanual.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/9/2021/04/a-novice-cheesemakers-guide-on-how-to-make-cheese-at-home.jpg?fit=800%2C800&p= 1" 样式="宽度：220px；高度：147px；" />;<br />;奶酪制作艺术是一项历史悠久的传统，远没有人们想象的那么复杂。如果您是奶酪鉴赏家，了解如何在家制作奶酪可以开启未经高温消毒的无限可能。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how-to-make-cheese-at-home" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36811316" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;最高的中庭（2019）</stitle>; <id>;https://www.world-architects.com/en/architecture-news/found/inside-the-worlds-tallest-atrium</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T05:00:05.583818Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.world-architects.com/en/architecture- news/found/inside-the-worlds-tallest-atrium"/>; <author>; <name>;近日点</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=perihelions</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://assets.world-architects.com/images/CmsImageContent/77/27/00/03f2b11e561a46eb 81cb305e8fd2c4b9/03f2b11e561a46eb81cb305e8fd2c4b9.f5fb7444.jpg"样式="宽度：220像素；高度：233像素；" />;<br />;丽泽SOHO是一座由扎哈·哈迪德建筑事务所设计的45层办公楼，本周在北京新丰台商务区竣工。塔内扭曲的中庭是世界上最高的，比卓美亚帆船酒店高出近15米。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-tallest-atrium-2019" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36810937" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;科学家在 COVID-19“网络研讨会”上发言后遭遇巨额账单</stitle>; <id>;https://www.science.org/content/article/costly-invite-scientists-hit-with-massive-bills-after-speaking-at-covid-19-conferences</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T09:00:05.584543Z</update d>; <link href="https://www.science.org/content/article/costly-invite-scientists-hit-with-massive-bills-after-speaking-at-covid-19-conferences"/>; <作者>; <name>;Stratscope</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Stratscope</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/# cients-hit-with-massive-bills-after-speaking-at-covid-19-webinars" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36833523" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;一位加州理工学院诺贝尔奖获得者庆祝他的 100 岁生日，然后重新开始工作</stitle>; <id>;https://www.latimes.com/science/story/2023-07-21/caltech-nobel-laureate-rudy-marcus-turns-100-and-gets-back-to-work</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T20:00:05.5 85288Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.latimes.com/science/story/2023-07-21/caltech-nobel-laureate-rudy-marcus-turns-100-and-gets-back-to-work"/>; <作者>; <name>;pseudolus</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pseudolus</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <img src="https://ca-times.brightspotcdn.com/dims4/default/aa698a7/2147483647/strip/true/crop/4122x2688+0+0/resize/1200x783!/quality/80/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcalifornia-times-brightspot.s3.amazonaws.com %2Ff6%2F93%2F74bbf1dd46a6ad8c553e8da16c8b%2F1324895-sci-caltech-nobel-laureate-turns-100-02-mjc.jpg" style="width: 220px;身高：144px;" />;<br />;加州理工学院化学教授鲁迪·马库斯 (Rudy Marcus) 通过继续工作庆祝了自己的 100 岁生日。同事和以前的学生聚集在一起向马库斯表示敬意，称他为榜样和科学家的优秀典范。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-caltech-nobel-laureate-celebrates-his-100th-birthday-then-gets-back-to-work" target ="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36828811" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我的乐器教会了我什么</stitle>; <id>;https://www.newyorker.com/culture/ the-weekend-essay/what-my-musical-instruments-have-taught-me</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T02:00:05.586001Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.newyorker.com/culture/the-weekend-essay/what-my-musical-instruments-have-taught-me"/>; <author>; <name>;jvandonsel</name>; <uri >;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jvandonsel</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://media.newyorker.com/photos/64b961418cd3dd8925166e06/master/w_2560%2Cc_limit/Lanier-Learning-Every-Instrument.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 270px;" />;<br />;母亲去世后，Jaron Lanier 迷上了钢琴，并开始用尽全力弹奏。此后，他成为了一名新乐器的强迫性探索者，学习演奏各种乐器。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#what-my-musical-instruments-have-taught-me" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.height: 270px;" />;<br />; ycombinator.com/item?id=36831879" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;记住电视打字机</stitle>; <id>;https://hackaday.com/2023/07/20/tv-typewriter-remembered/</id>; <updated>;20 23-07-23T03:00:05.586740Z</updated>; <link href="https://hackaday.com/2023/07/20/tv-typewriter-remembered/"/>; <author>; <name>;beardyw</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=beardyw</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://hack aday.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/tv_typewriter.jpg?w=800" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;Don Lancaster 的 TV Typewriter Cookbook 是一本很受欢迎的书，影响了自制视频显示器和 Apple 1 计算机的发展。它提供了如何构建使用电视进行输出的终端的说明，为 20 世纪 70 年代的家庭计算机用户提供了一种经济高效的解决方案。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#tv-typewriter-remembered" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36811240" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;为什么 SQLite 不使用 Git (2018)</stitle>; <id>;https://www.sqlite.org/draft/matrix/whynotgit.html </id>; <更新>;2023-07-23T00:00:05.589098Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.sqlite.org/draft/matrix/whynotgit.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;1vuio0pswjnm7</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=1vuio0pswjnm7</uri>; </作者>; <内容类型="html">;<img src="https://fossil-scm.org/home/doc/trunk/www/xkcd-git.gif" style="宽度：220px; height: 319px;" />;<br />;SQLite 不使用 Git 版本控制系统。SQLite 使用 Fossil，这是一个专门为支持 SQLite 而设计和编写的版本控制系统。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#why-sqlite-does-not-use-git-2018" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item? id=36830813" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;小大脑的早期人类聪明吗？科学家的说法引发争议</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theguardian.com/science/2023/jul/22/small-brained-early- humans- homo-naledi-cleverer-storm</id>; <更新>;2023-07-22T23:00:05.589885Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.theguardian.com/science/2023/jul/22/small-brained-early- humans-homo-naledi-cleverer-storm"/>; <作者>; <name>;pg_1234</name>; <uri>;https:// news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pg_1234</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://i.guim.co.uk/img/media/11c0fcbbb6163843b7403e4be1c5e02468287e14/120_0_3600_2160/master/3600.jpg?width=4 45&dpr=1&s=无" style="宽度: 220px;高度：132px;" />;<br />;研究人员上个月报告说，他们发现了一种由古代小脑人类物种制作的墓葬、雕刻符号和工具。这些发现表明，纳莱迪人在现代人类开始建造坟墓和艺术品之前近 25 万年就表现出了复杂的行为。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#were-small-brained-early- humans-intelligent-row-erupts-over-s cientists-claim" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36830697" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;客户端代理 – 个性化互联网的更好方法？ (2000 ）</stitle>; <id>;https://people.dsv.su.se/~jpalme/select/csp/thesis.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T05:00:05.590738Z</updated>; <link href="https://people.dsv.su.se/~jpalme/select/csp/thesis.html"/>; <author>; <name>;userbinator</name>; <uri>;https://news.y combinator.com/user?id=userbinator</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://people.dsv.su.se/~jpalme/select/csp/images/4_1_1.gif" style="width: 220px; height: 107px;" />;<br />;客户端代理是在 Internet 上查找数据并将其转换为有用信息的另一种方法。它们能够拦截通信并根据个人需求调整内容。但是，与其他方法相比，它们可能会产生更大的开销，并且更难以安装和配置。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#client-side-proxies-a-better-way-to-individualise-the-internet-2000" target ="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36824165" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;GradIEEEnt 半正派：不精确线条的隐藏力量 [视频]</stitle>; <id>;https ://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ae9EKCyI1xU</id>; <更新>;2023-07-22T23:00:05.591442Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ae9EKCyI1xU"/>; <作者>; <name>;franzb</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=franzb </uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<iframe src="//www.youtube.com/embed/Ae9EKCyI1xU"frameborder="0"allowfullscreen loading="lazy">;</iframe>; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#gradieeent-half-decent-the-hidden-power-of-imprecise-lines-video" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36806970" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;iCloud 如何工作？加上新版本的 Cirrus</stitle>; <id>;https://electiclight.co/2023/07/17/how-does-icloud-work-plus-a-new-version-of-cirrus/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T22:00:05.592170Z</updated>; <link href="https://electiclight.co/2023/07/17/how -does-icloud-work-plus-a-new-version-of-cirrus/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;janandonly</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=janandonly</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://eclecticlightdotcom.files.wordpress.com/2023/07/icloudintro1.jpg?w=1024" style="width: 220 像素；高度：191 像素；" />;<br />;iCloud 和 iCloud Drive 是使用 Mac 和 Apple 设备的基本功能。本文介绍了 iCloud（尤其是 iCloud Drive）现在如何工作的基础知识，并提供了我的免费实用程序 Cirrus 的新版本来帮助您研究它们。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how-does-icloud-work-plus-a-new-version-of-cirrus" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36830062" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews .betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;文本游戏 50 年解析基础类型的丰富历史</stitle>; <id>;https://arstechnica.com/gaming/2023/06/50-years-of-text-games-parses-the-rich-history-of-a-foundational-genre/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T09:00:05.5 92885Z</updated>; <link href="https://arstechnica.com/gaming/2023/06/50-years-of-text-games-parses-the-rich-history-of-a-foundational-genre/"/>; <作者>; <name>;KnuthIsGod</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=KnuthIsGod</uri>; </author>; <content type="html ">;<img src="https://cdn.arstechnica.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/maps-montage-800x475.jpg" style="宽度：220 像素；高度：131 像素；" />;<br />;《文字游戏 50 年》是一本探讨文字游戏的历史和影响的综合性书籍。作者 Aaron Reed 深入研究了这些游戏从早期解析器形式到现代迭代的发展过程，重点介绍了它们的世界构建、叙事塑造和玩家选择方面。本书还包括 500 个其他文字游戏的摘要，展示了这一类型的广度和深度。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#50-years-of-text-games-parses-the-rich-history-of-a-foundational-genre" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36833431" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;CoQ4 是 CoQ10 的功能替代品，可以靶向线粒体</stitle>; <id>;https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/2023.07.20.549963v2</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T00:00:05.59432 1Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/2023.07.20.549963v2"/>; <作者>; <name>;birriel</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=birriel</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.biorxiv.org/sites/default/file s/images/biorxiv_logo_homepage7-5-small.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;CoQ4可以作为人体细胞中CoQ10的替代品，在较低浓度下发挥多种功能。旨在将 CoQ4 靶向线粒体的化合物已在细胞模型中显示出前景。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#coq4-is-a-function-substitute-for-coq10-and-can-be-targeted-to-mitochondria" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36831067" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <条目 xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;南极标志</stitle>; <id>;https://brr.fyi/posts/south-pole-signage</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T08:00:05.595003Z</updated>; <link href="https://brr.fyi/posts/south-pole-signage "/>; <author>; <name>;tarf</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=tarf</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://brr.fyi/media/south-pole-signage/signage-04-small.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 165px;" />;<br />;尽管条件极端，但在南极生活仍涉及日常任务和基础设施。车站的标牌可以让您一睹这个地方的日常生活和独特之处。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#south-pole-signage" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36833252" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type=" text">;Egregoria：没有网格的 3D 城市生成器</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/Uriopass/Egregoria</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T21:00:05.595754Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/Uriopass/Egregoria"/>; <author>; <name>;dosshell</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user ?id=dosshell</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://media.githubusercontent.com/media/Uriopass/Egregoria/master/assets/screen2.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;Egregoria 是一家独立的城市建设者，专注于城市的社会经济方面，并具有物流元素。它仍处于早期开发和开源阶段，希望让更多人参与其开发。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#egregoria-3d-city-builder-without-a-grid" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36829374" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io /feed.xml">; <title type="text">;硅、二氧化硅、硅酸盐和硅酮 (1998) [pdf]</stitle>; <id>;https://minds.wisconsin.edu/bitstream/handle/1793/11591/Silicon.pdf</id>; <updated>;2023-07-23T00:00:05.596436Z</updated>; <link href="https://minds. wisconsin.edu/bitstream/handle/1793/11591/Silicon.pdf"/>; <author>; <name>;Kaibeezy</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Kaibeezy</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;硅、硅酸盐、二氧化硅和有机硅经常被混淆。硅是一种化学元素，占地壳的 27%，与氧结合形成硅酸盐。二氧化硅是硅和氧的结合物，石英和长石等矿物都是硅酸盐的例子。有机硅是一种硅与碳和氧的合成聚合物，用于医疗应用。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#silicon-silica-silicates-and-silicone-1998-pdf" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36810583" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews .betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;STX – C++17 和 C++ 20 错误处理和实用程序扩展</stitle>; <id>;https://lamarrr.github.io/STX/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T23:00:05.597116Z</updated>; <link href="https://lamarrr.github.io/STX/"/>; <author>; <name>;whou</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=whou</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://lamarrr.github.io/STX/eagle.png" style="width: 220px; height: 221px;" />;<br />;STX 是一个库和实用程序的集合，旨在使 C++ 的使用更加轻松且不易出错。它为 C++17 和 C++20 提供错误处理和实用程序扩展。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#stx-c-17-and-c-20-error-handling-and-utility-extensions" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36830492" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;美国最大的工具公司无法在美国生产扳手</stitle>; <id>;https://www.wsj.com/articles/craftsman-america-wrench-stanley-black-decker-reshoring-factory-1125792f</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T23:00:05.59 7800Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/craftsman-america-wrench-stanley-black-decker-reshoring-factory-1125792f"/>; <作者>; <name>;ortusdux</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ortusdux</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://images .wsj.net/im-821631/?width=1000&size=0.8" style="宽度：220px；高度：275px；" />;<br />;一家高度自动化的德克萨斯工厂本应将工匠机械工具的制造带回美国海岸。这个耗资 9000 万美元的项目因设备问题和生产缓慢而注定失败。世界上最大的工具公司不知道如何制造扳手。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#americas-largest-tool-company-couldnt-make-a-wrench-in-america" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36828861" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
